network

Class FlowNetwork

  • java.lang.Object
    • dsutil.generic.state.State
      • network.FlowNetwork
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, FlowNetworkInterface

    public class FlowNetwork
extends dsutil.generic.state.State
implements FlowNetworkInterface
    A flow network facilitates and mandates the topology of a flow network. This class can be used for the following: - Build a flow network topology - Alter the topology by activating/deactivating nodes and links - Access nodes and links - Compute topological generic metrics FlowNetwork is a State class that contains global information about the network. Recommended use of this class: First add all nodes and then add the links to connect them!
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getIslands

        public java.util.ArrayList<FlowNetwork> getIslands()
        Description copied from interface: FlowNetworkInterface
        Extract islands
        Specified by:
        getIslands in interface FlowNetworkInterface
        Returns:
        ArrayList where each entry is a new FlowNetwork object containing nodes and links belonging to this island. islands.size() gives number of islands.
